title: Jenna Bush Hager Is Unhappy With Taylor Swift
description: But she's totally still a Swiftie.
content:

Yahoo is using AI to generate takeaways from this article. This means the info may not always match what's in the article. Reporting mistakes helps us improve the experience. Generate Key Takeaways

Jenna Bush Hager Is Unhappy With Taylor Swift originally appeared on Parade.

On the August 12 episode of Today With Jenna and Friends, Bush Hager and her guest co-host Erin Andrews talked about the major Taylor Swift announcement that was made at 12:12 a.m.

"You know I’m a Swiftie, but why does she have to drop everything at midnight?” Bush Hager asked.

"It’s her thing!" Andrews said after singing Swift's "Midnights." "It’s too late for you."

"I think everybody drops things at midnight. Why can’t she drop it at 12 p.m.?” Bush Hager continued. The mom of three, who's up early for work five days a week, is clearly not staying up past midnight on a regular basis. And, of course, if you were sleeping last night, you missed some of the biggest music news of the year: Swift is releasing a new album.

🎬 SIGN UP for Parade’s Daily newsletter to get the latest pop culture news & celebrity interviews delivered right to your inbox 🎬

Andrews, who got to hang out with Swift and Travis Kelce in Montana over the summer, felt the exact opposite of Bush Hager, sharing her support for Swift's calculated career moves.

"It’s her thing! It’s what makes her so magical. I love it so much," Andrews said.

Swift will be on the August 13 episode of the New Heights podcast where she will officially announce the release of her twelfth studio album, The Life of a Showgirl.

“What do you think about the fact that she announced it on his podcast?” Bush Hager asked Andrews. "I think for them to announce it on his podcast confirms everything that all of us Swifties would hope, which is that they’ve got something really great going on," she added.

Andrews is totally in support of the couple and sees just how happy they are together, which has her even more jazzed for this major podcast episode.

"They are so fun to be around. Everybody already knows his personality. He’s hilarious, he’s super swaggy, he’s so fun. She is hysterical, so witty… I’m so excited for this podcast to drop tomorrow," she said.

Jenna Bush Hager Is Unhappy With Taylor Swift first appeared on Parade on Aug 12, 2025

This story was originally reported by Parade on Aug 12, 2025, where it first appeared.
summary: On the August 12 episode of Today With Jenna and Friends, Jenna Bush Hager expressed dissatisfaction with Taylor Swift's announcement of a new album at 12:12 a.m. Her guest co-host, Erin Andrews, supported Swift's career moves, stating that it's her thing. The announcement was made on the August 13 episode of the New Heights podcast, where Swift will officially announce the release of her twelfth studio album.
shortSummary: Jenna Bush Hager is upset with Taylor Swift for dropping a major announcement at midnight, despite her love for her music.

scraped_sources.text:
Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are dancing in a snow globe.
The couple enjoyed a private getaway to Lone Mountain Ranch in Big Sky, Montana, according to multiple outlets, where they were joined by sportscaster Erin Andrews for dinner.
E! News has reached out to reps for Travis, Taylor and Erin for comment but has not yet heard back.
It’s the second cooler locale Taylor and Travis have journeyed to in their newfound downtime following the end of Travis’ NFL season and the close of her Eras Tour. The couple enjoyed time in Park City, Utah, earlier this month, where fans saw them grab dinner out together.
Erin, for her part, has been Travis and Taylor’s number one fan long before they made their relationship official.
In fact, the 46-year-old and her podcast partner Charissa Thompson practically spoke the power couple’s romance into existence way back in August 2023, shortly after Travis revealed he fumbled while trying to give Taylor a friendship bracelet at her Kansas City concert.
"Taylor, I don't know what you're doing in your life right now besides rocking the world," Erin said during the pair's Calm Down with Erin and Charissa podcast. "Please, try our friend Travis. He is fantastic. I know we're not the best of friends, we're not even friends, but I consider you one. Take us up on this. Go on a date with this guy."
To which Charissa added, “Do it for yourself, do it for us, and do it for the people. Because there is no one who would give you a better time than this guy."
And indeed, with the Grammy winner and Kansas City Chiefs player’s romance coming to fruition shortly thereafter, even Travis himself has credited the pair for their manifesting.
As he commented on Charissa’s throwback to the clip in October 2023, “You two are something else!! I owe you big time!!"
Since then, Erin has remained ready on the bench to support Taylor and Travis’ relationship.
"I want them to get married so bad," the FOX Sports commentator told E! News in March 2024. "I love, love. I love him. He's amazing."
And of Taylor, she added, “I'm fully obsessed with her and what she's done in her life, how she makes me feel as a woman."
For more of Taylor and Travis’ best moments, keep reading.

argos_summary: Jenna Bush Hager expressed her frustration with Taylor Swift's tendency to announce new music at midnight, during an episode of Today With Jenna and Friends. Co-host Erin Andrews defended Swift's approach, highlighting its uniqueness and magic. The discussion also touched on Swift's upcoming album announcement on the New Heights podcast, where Andrews expressed excitement for both the album and Swift's relationship with Travis Kelce.
